mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT c.chat_id, u.nickname,c.comment,c.regdate, c.board_id, c.status FROM test_chat AS c, test_user AS u WHERE c.from_user = u.user_id) AS cu, test_board AS b WHERE cu.board_id = b.board_id ORDER BY regdate;
mapper.update: update test_chat set status=status+1 where chat_id=1;
